sourcesContent:
let totalContainer = {
  width: "70%",
  height: "22px",
  backgroundColor: "#4382BC",
  margin: "8px 0 0 10px",
  borderRadius: "4px",
  display: "flex"
}

let totalTitleMain = {
  minWidth: "200px",
  textAlign: "center",
  fontSize: "15px"
}

let totalTitleOther = {
  margin: "1px 2px 0 0",
  fontSize: "14px"
}

let totalBarItem = {
  width: "200px",
  paddingLeft: "2px",
  margin: "3px 5px 0px 0px" ,
  backgroundColor: "white",
  height: "16px",
  borderRadius:"4px",
  fontSize: "13px"
}

let totalInput = {
  width: "30px",
  height: "16px",
  margin: "3px 3px 0px 2px",
  paddingTop: "0px",
  border: "0"
}

let totalButton = {
  width: "25px",
  height: "17px",
  backgroundColor: "#e8fefd",
  borderRadius: "2px",
  marginTop: "3px",
  cursor: "pointer"
}

let totalButtonLine = {
  width: "8px",
  height: "1px",
  backgroundColor: "black",
  margin: "8px 0px 0px 8px"
}

export {
  totalContainer,
  totalTitleMain,
  totalTitleOther,
  totalBarItem,
  totalInput,
  totalButton,
  totalButtonLine
}
